impact-statement: Building on previous work (<xref ref-type="bibr" rid="bib5">Diao et al., 2012</xref>), we show that the mechanism by which complexin suppresses spontaneous fusion is distinct from the mechanism by which it synchronizes Ca<sup>2+</sup>-triggered fusion.
